gramGrp.pos:
REPORT VB
with
OBJ, REPORT VB,
or
VB
with
TO-INF

sense.def:
To promise to do something
pomeni reči, da bomo nekaj zanesljivo naredili.

seg.quote: I promised to take the children to the fair.

sense.def:
To promise someone something
pomeni reči nekomu, da mu bomo zanesljivo nekaj dali ali da bomo poskrbeli, da bo tisto dobil.

seg.quote: I promised him a canary for his birthday.

sense.def:
A promise
je izjava, s katero nekomu obljubimo, da mu bomo zanesljivo nekaj dali ali naredili zanj.

seg.quote: They tried to break the promises made in negotiations.
They fulfilled their promise to revive trade.

sense.def:
Kadar položaj ali dogodek
promises to have a particular quality
, po njem lahko sklepamo, da bo pozneje imel določeno lastnost.

seg.quote: The debate promises to be lively.

sense.def:
Kadar nekdo ali nekaj
shows promise
, vse kaže, da bo tista oseba ali stvar zelo dobra ali uspešna.

seg.quote: She showed considerable promise as a tennis player.
